actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend to 48 months the rollover period for nonrecognition of gain on the sale of a principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend from 18 to 24 months the period (rollover period) during which a taxpayer must reinvest the proceeds from the sale of a principal residence in a new residence in order to qualify for the nonrecognition of any gain from such sale.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend to 48 months the rollover period for nonrecognition of gain on the sale of a principal residence.
